sqlMap.statement: SELECT CW.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CW.CINC_GLBL_WH_CD ,CW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_DT ,CW.INTFC_CPO_ORD_NUM ,CW.CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CW.CINC_RCV_GLBL_WH_CD ,CW.CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CW.CINC_GLBL_CMPY_CATG_CD ,CW.INTFC_SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,CW.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD ,CW.PRT_SIZE_TXT ,CW.INTFC_ORD_QTY_SGN_TXT ,CW.INTFC_ORD_QTY ,CW.INTFC_RSD_DT ,CW.INTFC_EXPD_SHIP_DT ,CW.INTFC_RDD_DT ,CW.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD ,CW.CINC_GLBL_ORD_CATG_CD ,CW.PRT_CHRG_IND ,CW.PRT_EMER_ORD_IND ,CW.INTFC_CRAT_DT FROM INTFC_CPO_WRK CW WHERE CW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CW.INTFC_CRAT_DT = #intfcCratDt# AND CW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY INTFC_CPO_ORD_NUM ,INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD ,PRT_SIZE_TXT ,INTFC_CPO_ORD_DT ,CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD ,CINC_GLBL_WH_CD
